description: A 17-year-old world-class pianist, he is second only to Kiyotaka Narumi, Ayumu Narumi`s older brother. He is seemingly cold-hearted but definitely not heartless. Eyes is quarter English and made his d√©but in the musical world at the age of 14. He cares a great deal about the Blade Children and would do anything for them to survive at all costs.
name: Eyes Rutherford
